data.title: Pana Musica
data.meta_description: Choral Sheet Music Specialists Pana Musica
data.text:
for SSAATTBB unaccompanied

The weather, the most quintessentially English of topics, was the inspiration for this work. Chilcott weaves together a tapestry of well-known weather rhymes, such as 'The rain it raineth every day upon the just and the unjust fella', and 'Whether the weather', in a work that is energetic, quirky, and entertaining. His choral writing is inventive and full of character, using layered rhythms and jazzy harmonies. This will be a fun piece to perform, and perfect as a light addition to any concert programme.

Composer : CHILCOTT, Bob (UK 1955-)

Publisher : Oxford University Press

Panamusicacode : GC2725

SSAATTBB a cappella

Text : English

Duration : 5'00"

View product details or purchase

for SATB a cappella

The texts were taken from the unique bilingual quatrains by Hajime Kijima.

All the songs are composed both in Japanese and English. The art of pronunciation in 2 languages and many forms led from there can be said as the characteristics of this composition.

Composer: NOBUNAGA, Takatomi (Japan 1971-)

Author of the text: KIJIMA, Hajime

Publisher: Ongaku no Tomo Sha(Japan)

Panamusica code : GZNBTKU

SATB div. a cappella

Text : English + Japanese (Romanized)

Duration: 14'10"

View product details or purchase

An advanced work for SSAATTBB a cappella

The text was taken from the collection of poems by Kozo Takeuch who died in the World War II.

The composer wished to express the preciousness of life, painfulness in living and the humanity energetically.

Composer: NIIMI, Tokuhide (Japan 1947-)

Author of the text: TAKEUCHI, Kohzoh

Publisher : Ongaku no Tomo Sha(Japan)

Panamusica code : GZNITKW

SSAATTBB a cappella

Text : Japanese (Romanized)

Duration: 11'00"

View product details or purchase

a funny drinking song for SA+SA+TB+TB

The text was taken from the "Carmina Potatoria", 3rd section of Carmina Burana, collection of poems and songs written by goliards, clergy wandering students of the 12th or 13th century given to the writing of satiric Latin verse and to convivial living and minstrelsy.

Composer : MALACHEVSKY, Eduardo Andres (Argentina 1960-)

Publisher : Annie Bank

Panamusica code : GM1603

SA+SA+TB+TB a cappella

Text : Latin

Duration : 3'15"

View product details or purchase

17 great songs for mixed voices (S.A.T.B./S.A.Bar.), incl. annotated authentic piano part and chord symbols. New pieces and modern styled traditionals on 70 pages.

Arranger : GUILLEN, Jeff

Publisher : Zebe Publishing

Panamusica code : KG0040A

SAB-SATB/a cappella, Piano

Text : English

Contents :

Jesus, O What a Wonderful Child / Gloria Hallelujah /

Rise Up Shepherd And Follow (Follow the Star) /

Jesus, the Light of the World / The Birthday of a King /

Heard from Heaven Today / God Rest You, Merry Gentlemen /

Ain't That a Rocking / Joy to the World / This Child /

Go Tell It on the Mountains / Behold the Star /

Glorious Kingdom / Silent Night / Mary Had a Baby

Sweet Little Jesus Boy / Wonderful Counselor

View product details or purchase

for SATB, piano, and optional bass and drum kit ad lib.

A highly original and effective concert setting of the Latin Missa brevis in which the various movements embrace a variety of jazz styles. The characterful piano accompaniment can be played as written or serve as a guide, and bass and drums can join in ad lib.

Composer : CHILCOTT, Bob (UK 1955-)

Publisher : Oxford University Press

Panamusica code : GC2722

SATB div. Piano/optional bass and drum kit ad lib.

Text : Latin

Duration : 12'00"

Contents :

Kyrie / Gloria / Sanctus / Benedictus / Agnus Dei

View product details or purchase

for SATB

Gaudete! brings together ten exciting new arrangements of traditional carols by one of the world's best-loved writers of Christmas choral music.

Arranger : CHILCOTT, Bob (UK 1955-)

Publisher : Oxford University Press

Panamusica code : GC2723

SATB div. a cappella/Piano

Text : English, Latin, French, German

Contents :

Away in a manger / Coventry Carol / Gaudete! /

Il est ne, le divin enfant / Jesus, Jesus, rest your head /

Jingle, Bells / Still, still, still / Sussex Carol /

We wish you a merry Christmas / What child is this?

View product details or purchase

for SATB choir, unaccompanied and with piano

Nine classic Chilcott songs including original pieces and arrangements of traditional material. The varied nature of the collection highlights Chilcott's prodigious gifts. Some of the pieces are published here for the first time.

Composer : CHILCOTT, Bob (UK 1955-)

Publisher : Oxford University Press

Panamusica code : GC2724

SATB-SAATB div. a cappella/Piano

Text : English, Japanese(romanized), Welsh

Contents :

Aka-Tonbo / Ar Hyd y Nos /

Composed upon Westminster Bridge, September 3, 1802 /

Dance in the Street / O Danny boy / Over the Wave /

The Lily and the Rose / The Runner / The Skye Boat Song

View product details or purchase

SongStream 2: An American Journey is a second collection of ten songs for youth choirs, largely scored for SAB with some divisi and optional parts. These exciting, accessible, and stylistically varied pieces take you on a journey from Canada through North to Central and South America.

Editor : CHILCOTT, Bob & HUNT, Peter

Publisher : Oxford University Press

Panamusica code : KG1050B

SAB a cappella/Piano

Text : English, French, Spanish

Contents :

Amazing Grace / Buffalo Gals / Erosion /

El Gavilan (The Sparrow-hawk) / The Pessimist (Easy Winners) /

Les Raftsmen / Senora Santa Ana / Take flight /

Wanting Memories (from Crossings) / Wayfarin' Stranger

View product details or purchase

for SATB unaccompanied or with keyboard

This is the perfect choral anthology for all mixed choirs who are sure that Santa Claus is coming to town! This collection boasts twelve dazzling arrangements of the top Christmas classics by some of America's best jazz and vocal arrangers.

Editor : RUBINO, Jerry

Publisher : Oxford University Press

Panamusica code : KG9982D

SATB div. a cappella / Piano

Text : English

Contents :

Blue Christmas / A Christms Love Song / Feliz Navidad /

Have yourself a merry little Christmas / I'll be home for Christmas /

It's the most wonderful time of the year! /

Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer / Santa Claus is coming to town /

We need a little Christmas / We wish you a merry Christmas /

What are you doing New Year's Eve? / Winter Wonderland

View product details or purchase
